doc:
Larry Shue https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Larry_Shue 0 Larry Howard Shue (July 23, 1946 – September 23, 1985) was an American playwright and actor, best known for writing two often-performed farces, The Nerd and The Foreigner. Larry_Howard_Shue ( July_23_,_1946 – September_23_,_1985 ) was an_American_playwright_and_actor , best_known for writing two_often-performed_farces , The_Nerd and The_Foreigner .
